Html:
HI

I have these SVG files sets  in which I have some children with polyline and style with fill.

The svg.dll wont let me fill the content unless I make the polyline into polygon (by editing the svg file set)

Does SVG standard require polyline to be able to be filled as well, because these sets of svg files has a lot of same

type of files.

Regards/

Additional note to this.

Some java applications for SVG processing can do this somehow. Like batik-squiggle.jar , so I am not sure if the standard asks you to do this or not.

Best Regards

Atilla
